name: Acidic Backlash
value: You take 2d6 points of acid damage.

name: Apprentice Move
value: Reroll attack against creature nearest the target (yourself excluded).

name: Arcane Fire
value: You take 2d6 points of fire damage.

name: Backblast
value: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

name: Blastoff
value: You are thrown 1d6x10 feet into the air (or in a @RollTable[q6lsEqmsqZWShTIV]{Random Direction} if flying) (Will negates).

name: Bleeding Eyes
value: You take 1d6 points of bleed.

name: Can You Hear Me Now?
value: You are deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal check).

name: Caster's Block
value: You cannot cast this spell for 24 hours.

name: Clatto Verata Necktie
value: Your attack hits the nearest ally and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

name: Cold Snap
value: You take 2d6 points of cold damage.

name: Cursed
value: You take a -4 penalty on attack rolls, saves, skill checks, and ability checks. This effect can only be cured with remove curse.

name: Distance Rift
value: You are teleported to the nearest square adjacent to the target.

name: Electrical Feedback
value: You take 2d6 points of electricity damage.

name: Energy Transfer
value: Lose one randomly determined spell or spell slot. Your target can cast this spell next round.

name: Error!
value: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

name: Fragmented Magic
value: 1d4+2 mirror images spring up around your target. These images last for 1 minute or until destroyed.

name: Hit By The Ugly Forest
value: You take 1 point of CHA bleed.

name: How Did That Happen?
value: A stinking cloud appears, centered on you.

name: It's Sparkly
value: You are blinded for 1 round.

name: Jumbled Components
value: You can only take a move action next round.

name: Left Reeling
value: You are stunned for 1 round (Fort negates).

name: Magic Fatigue
value: You cannot cast any spell for 1 round.

name: Magical Smackdown
value: You automatically fail your next saving throw.

name: Magical Vacuum
value: 1d3 spell effects active on you are dispelled (determined randomly).

name: Mental Slip
value: On his next turn, your target may give you one suggestion.

name: Mind Drain
value: You take 1d4 points of damage to INT, WIS or CHA (determined randomly 1d3).

name: Monster Rift
value: Your spell is converted to a summon monster spell of the same level. The monster attacks you.

name: Nose Bleed
value: You take 1 point of bleed.

name: Not Me, You Fool!
value: Your attack hits your ally closest to the target.

name: Now I See You...
value: Your target becomes invisible for 1d4 rounds.

name: Nothing To Fear
value: You are shaken for 2d4 rounds.

name: Poor Trade
value: The attack hits but you must lose a spell or slot of the highest available level (your choice).

name: Power Down
value: You take 1 point of INT bleed.

name: Power Drain
value: You lose one prepared spell or spell slot (determined randomly).

name: Power Transfer
value: The highest-level spell effect on you is transferred to your target.

name: Reflection
value: The spell hits you instead of the target (normal saves apply).

name: Side Effect
value: One of your magic items permanently gains a random drawback.

name: Spell Shield
value: The target gains SR equal to 11 + your caster level for 1d6 rounds.

name: Tangled
value: You become tangled in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.

name: The Magic Is Gone
value: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.

name: This Is Hard
value: You take 1 point of CON damage.

name: Tiring Spell
value: You are fatigued.

name: Unexpected Blast
value: The spell affects all targets within 30 feet of you. You are immune to this effect.

name: Vertigo
value: You are sickened for 1d4 rounds.

name: Weak-Minded Fool
value: You take 1 point of WIS bleed.

name: Weakened
value: You take a -2 penalty to all of your spell DCs for 1d4 minutes.

name: Why Me?
value: You provoke attacks of opportunity from all threatening foes.

name: Wild Magic
value: Roll twice on the Rod of Wonder table here.

name: You Made Him Bigger
value: Target increases one size category for 1d4 rounds.

name: You Made Him Faster
value: The target is hasted for 1d4 rounds.

name: You Made Him Stronger
value: The target gains a +8 enhancement bonus to STR for 1d4 rounds.

name: You Made Him Tougher
value: The target gains DR 5/- for 1d4 rounds.
